description:
cmd/cgo: split cgo_export into cgo_export_static and cgo_export_dynamic

Also emit cgo_ldflag pragmas.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/
Is this fixing a particular issue?

Yes, all the cgo work is toward fixing issue 4069, but I haven't been using
'update issue' because it doesn't work half the time and the issue isn't
close to being fixed yet.

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/7530043/diff/5001/src/cmd/cgo/doc.go
File src/cmd/cgo/doc.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7530043/diff/5001/src/cmd/cgo/doc.go#newcode516
src/cmd/cgo/doc.go:516: For compatibility with current versions of SWIG,
I don't think you need this sentence here, it already appears above under cgo_export_dynamic.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=011944857f1f ***

cmd/cgo: split cgo_export into cgo_export_static and cgo_export_dynamic

Also emit cgo_ldflag pragmas.

R=golang-dev, remyoudompheng, iant
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7530043
